TEXT.S: Carmelo Anthony tatama, lumeniay a banges, u Amilika kanatal a tademaw. unu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, u adidi'ay ayaway mimaliay. Carmelo Anthony i 2003 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 3, namapili' tu nu Denver Nuggets putiput. 5 bulad 29 demiad, 1984 a mihca, Carmelo Anthony, miunduay.
